content: I don’t have personal preferences or thoughts, but i recommend hiking as the best activity for first-time visitors to banff national park. banff is known for its stunning alpine views, and there are numerous easy hikes suitable for beginners that offer breathtaking scenery. some must-visit trails include johnston canyon, lake agnes teahouse, moraine lake, and tunnel mountain. hiking is also a great way to immerse yourself in the natural beauty of banff while getting some exercise and fresh air.
